title: Image as Page Layout
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017185134im_/http:/typophile.com/files/magazine_layout_5938.jpg)
  
I love how this literary magazine utilizes image as a layout. The whole spread is given an antique-like feel. It's hard to tell in the scan, but the image used is scanned (or seems to be scanned it) in and used as a background texture for the layout. There is more than one spread like this in the book, and I found it very fitting that this particular type of image (texture) be in a literary magazine..
author: srquresh
